    Create a new assignment

    Create a new lecture in the website repository

    Create a new module

    Create a new module on the course website

    Retrieve the Canvas API URL

    get_canvas_py_code_header()

    Retrieve the header Python code for sending commands to Canvas

    Retrieve the Canvas token

    get_course_id()

    Retrieve the Canvas course ID

    Retrieve the Canvas token

    get_site_url()

    Retrieve the site URL.
